pr_title: Alter storybook config to load more static files

timeline.message:
Alter storybook config to load more static files

This hopefully means that thumbnail images will load properly in SearchResult related tests

timeline.author: ChristianMurphy

replies.bodyText:
ah

Also included in this PR is small change to an action inside SearchResultList.stores, so it has a more descriptive name

I see, it appears to be the only on change 🤷‍♂️
But it also doesn't hurt.
replies.author: ChristianMurphy
